feed.title: Mailing List Administrivia - GPG, Archives, Breakage, TODO, mirrors, etc

entry.title: Mailing List Administrivia - GPG, Archives, Breakage, TODO, mirrors, etc
entry.summary: The email archive system "mbox" has been causing some emails to become lost in mirrors, as they do not appear in the archives. Additionally, the attachment link for users of the web "archive" has stripped off the final blank line that was present in the original attachment, potentially leading to detached signatures failing. The email in question can be found at http://lists.linuxfoundation.org/pipermail/bitcoin-dev/2015-July/009439.html and the attachment can be downloaded from http://lists.linuxfoundation.org/pipermail/bitcoin-dev/attachments/20150716/63f50962/attachment-0001.bin with SHA1 (lost.c) = 4c6284510d73031eac16ddac53363137f39499e0.
